items.raw_desc: Konzol játék The Thing: Remastered: Deluxe Edition - Nintendo Switch: Horror ShooterThe Thing: Remastered Nintendo Switch brings back the iconic 2002 horror shooter that served as a sequel to Universal Pictures' famous 1982 film The Thing. This survival horror action takes you to a harsh Arctic environment where you'll face the horrors of the unknown and fight for survival against an ever-changing threat. Remastered versionNightdive Studios has produced a meticulous remaster that preserves the original feel of The Thing while bringing it up to modern standards. Enhanced visuals such as anti-aliasing, advanced pixel-level lighting and support for 4K high-definition ensure an immersive gaming experience. Optimised up to 144 frames per second, you'll enjoy smoother, more dynamic action. Fear and paranoiaFans of the original and new players alike will get a chance to relive the suspense, uncertainty and horror that makes The Thing a unique title. Prepare for intense clashes, strategic decision-making and a constant sense of paranoia that is the stuff of legend in The Thing:...
